Package: org.grails.datastore.mapping.cache

[Java] Interface TPCacheAdapterRepository<T>


  • public interface TPCacheAdapterRepository<T>

    A repository of TPCacheAdapters.

    Authors:
    Roman Stepanenko

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Params Return Type Name and description
        public TPCacheAdapter<T> getTPCacheAdapter(PersistentEntity entity)
        Returns TPCacheAdapter for the specified PersistentEntity.
        public void setTPCacheAdapter(PersistentEntity entity, TPCacheAdapter<T> cacheAdapter)
        Sets TPCacheAdapter for the specified PersistentEntity.
        public void setTPCacheAdapter(java.lang.Class entityJavaClass, TPCacheAdapter<T> cacheAdapter)
        Sets TPCacheAdapter for the specified java class of PersistentEntity.
        public void setTPCacheAdapter(java.lang.String entityJavaClassFQN, TPCacheAdapter<T> cacheAdapter)
        Sets TPCacheAdapter for the specified FQN java class of PersistentEntity.

    • Method Detail

      • public TPCacheAdapter<T> getTPCacheAdapter(PersistentEntity entity)

        Returns TPCacheAdapter for the specified PersistentEntity.

        Parameters:
        entity - the entity
        Returns:
        null if no TPCacheAdapter is found for the specified entity

      • public void setTPCacheAdapter(PersistentEntity entity, TPCacheAdapter<T> cacheAdapter)

        Sets TPCacheAdapter for the specified PersistentEntity. If the specified entity had another cache adapter before, the old one is ignored after this call.

        Parameters:
        entity - the entity
        cacheAdapter - the adapter

      • public void setTPCacheAdapter(@java.lang.SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") java.lang.Class entityJavaClass, TPCacheAdapter<T> cacheAdapter)

        Sets TPCacheAdapter for the specified java class of PersistentEntity. If the specified entity had another cache adapter before, the old one is ignored after this call.

        Parameters:
        entityJavaClass - equivalent to PersistentEntity.getJavaClass
        cacheAdapter - the adapter

      • public void setTPCacheAdapter(java.lang.String entityJavaClassFQN, TPCacheAdapter<T> cacheAdapter)

        Sets TPCacheAdapter for the specified FQN java class of PersistentEntity. If the specified entity had another cache adapter before, the old one is ignored after this call.

        Parameters:
        entityJavaClassFQN - equivalent to PersistentEntity.getJavaClass.getName()
        cacheAdapter - the adapter
